short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hold Alt to use basic Spanish accented characters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lets users insert basic accented characters on certain sites just by holding Alt while typing the normal character.

Current Working Sites:
- VHL Central
- Word Reference

Supported Accented Characters:
á, é, í, ñ, ó, ú, ¿, ¡, Á, É, Í, Ñ, Ó, Ú
